title: Top Nav Bar -> Play Icon Present on Top Nav Bar-> Unauthenticated
custom_preconds:
* User has 24.7.1 or later build installed
* User is not logged in
custom_steps:
Given the user opens the app
When the user looks at the top Nav Bar
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the following on the Top Nav Bar (from left to right)

* "Log In"
* MLB Logo
* Play Icon
* Browse Menu (hamburger menu

title: Top Nav Bar -> Play Icon Present on Top Nav Bar-> Authenticated
custom_preconds:
* User has 24.7.1 or later build installed
* User is  logged in
custom_steps:
Given the user opens the app
When the user looks at the top
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the following on the Top Nav Bar (from left to right)

* Account Settings Icon
* MLB Logo
* Play Icon
* Browse Menu (hamburger menu

title: Top Nav Bar- > Deep Link -> Play Icon
custom_preconds: * User has 24.7.1 or later build installed
custom_steps:
Given the user has this link available 
When the user follows this link -> mlbatbat://gaminghub
custom_expected: Then the user will be brought to the Game Hub menu of the app

title: Play Icon -> Only Visible on Home Screen
custom_preconds: * User is has 24.7.1 or later downloaded
custom_steps:
Given the user navigates to the various tabs from the bottom nav bar
When the user checks the upper nav bar on each page
custom_expected: Then the user will only see the play icon on the home page
